snippet: Israel negotiated with Turkey over compensation for a deadly commando raid on a Gaza-bound flotilla in 2010, but few involved expected a full reconciliation between the former allies.
abstract: Turkey keeps low profile during negotiations with Israel over compensation for a deadly commando raid on a Gaza-bound flotilla in 2010, demonstrating that while relations between two countries are improving, they will not be as warm as they once were.
lead_paragraph: Israel negotiated with Turkey over compensation for a deadly commando raid on a Gaza-bound flotilla in 2010, but few involved expected a full reconciliation between the former allies.

headline.seo: Israel and Turkey Negotiate Compensation in Flotilla Raid
headline.main: Israel and Turkey in Talks Over Deadly Flotilla Raid
headline.print_headline: Israel and Turkey in Talks Over Deadly Flotilla Raid
